This was #15908 in b5f0aff49503e31002b33198e06708e263c445a7. The old behavior was racy and not documented. It was also a little too magic before.

We could document it in the release notes, but the main party it would affect (which I thought was already aware and not affected?) was Caddy. But I guess I was wrong about that, since it did affect Caddy.
